population <- read_excel("world-population.xlsm")
population

ggplot(population, aes(x = Year, y = Population))+
  geom_line(color = 'red')+
  labs(title = "World Population by Year", x = "Year", y = "Population")+
  scale_y_continuous(label=comma)


x<-population$Year
y<-population$Population

ggplot()+
  geom_step(data = population, mapping= aes(x=x, y=y))+
  geom_step(mapping=aes(x=x, y=y), direction="vh", linetype=3)+
  labs(title = "World Population by Year", x = "Year", y = "Population")+
  scale_y_continuous(label=comma)
